properties.entry: SELECT REPLY_NO, USER_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(REPLY_DATE , 'YY/MM/DD HH:MI:SS') REPLY_DATE FROM REPLY R JOIN MEMBER ON (REPLY_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE R.REPLY_STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NO = ? ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC , REPLY_NO
INSERT INTO REPLY (REPLY_NO, BOARD_NO, USER_NO, REPLY_CONTENT) VALUES (SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL, ?,?,?)
